what: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Test data (SDTM) pharmaverse family packages

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: provide one-stop-shop SDTM test data pharmaverse family packages. includes datasets therapeutic area (TA)-agnostic (DM, VS, EG, etc.) well TA-specific ones (RS, TR, OE, etc.).

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: package available CRAN can installed running install.packages("pharmaversesdtm"). install latest development version package directly GitHub use following code:

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: test datasets sourced CDISC pilot project, datasets constructed ad-hoc admiral team. Please check Github repository detailed information regarding source specific datasets.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Datasets TA-agnostic: SDTM domain name (e.g., dm, rs). Datasets TA-specific: prefix domain name TA (e.g., onco_rs, ophtha_oe). Note: SDTM domain used multiple TAs, pharmaversesdtm may provide multiple versions corresponding test dataset. instance, package contains ex ophtha_ex latter contains ophthalmology-specific variables EXLAT EXLOC, EXROUTE exchanged plausible ophthalmology value.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Firstly, make GitHub issue repo planned updates tag @pharmaverse/admiral one development core team can sanity check request. two main ways extend test data: either adding new datasets extending existing datasets new records/variables. Whichever method choose, worth noting following: Programs generate test data stored dev/ folder. programs written standalone R script: packages need loaded given program, call library() start program (please call library(pharmaversesdtm)). packages likely need already specified renv.lock file, already installed keeping sync–can check entering renv::status() Console. However, may also wish install metatools ggplot2, currently specified renv.lock file. feel need install packages addition just mentioned, please tag @pharmaverse/admiral discuss development core team. created program dev/ folder, need run standalone R script, order generate test dataset become part pharmaversesdtm package, need build package. Following best practice, dataset stored .rda file whose name consistent name dataset: example, dataset dm renamed raw_dm saving raw_dm.rda; save dm raw_dm.rda subsequently load .rda file, dm (raw_dm) loaded global environment. programs dev/ stored within pharmaversesdtm GitHub repository, part pharmaversesdtm package–dev/ folder specified .Rbuildignore. run program dev/ folder, generate dataset written data/ folder, become part pharmaversesdtm package. names test datasets specified R/data.R, purpose generating documentation man/ folder.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Create program dev/ folder, named <name>.R, <name> SDTM domain name, (e.g. rs.R), generate test data output <name>.rda data/ folder. Use CDISC pilot data dm input program order create realistic synthetic data remains consistent domains. Note personal data used part package, even anonymized. Run program. Reflect update, specifying <name> R/data.R. Run devtools::document() order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/.

title: Test Data for the Pharmaverse Family of Packages
text: Rename source dataset raw_<name>, <name> SDTM domain name (e.g. rename ds raw_ds), save data/ folder raw_<name>.rda (e.g. save(raw_ds, file = "data/raw_ds.rda")). Create program dev/ folder, named update_<name>.R, load raw_<name>.rda, make updates, output <name>.rda data/ folder. Run program. Reflect update, specifying raw_<name> <name> R/data.R. Run devtools::document() order update NAMESPACE update .Rd files man/.
